titleStmt.title: The antipodes a comedie. Acted in the yeare 1638. by the Queenes Majesties Servants, at Salisbury Court in Fleet-street. The author Richard Brome.
titleStmt.author: Brome, Richard, d. 1652?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Okes, for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shops in Kings-street at the signe of the Goat, and in Westminster-hall,

notesStmt.note: The verse on A4r signed "Rob. Chamberlain.". Variant: verses signed "R.C.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
